responses.rationale: Reports the number of birds killed ('5.3 million hens and 88,000 turkeys') factually without vivid verbs or risk adjectives.
Reports the total number of birds killed ('about 22 million birds') and breakdown factually.
Reports the number of birds killed in Iowa ('about 13 million chickens and 305,000 turkeys') factually.
Reports the number of chickens on farms ('46 million chickens') factually based on data.
Reports the annual number of turkeys raised ('about 11.7 million turkeys annually') factually.
Describes the cause of disease spread, not prices or economic metrics.
Reports the number of states with confirmed cases ('23 states') factually based on data.
Reports the number of birds on an affected farm ('35,500 birds') factually.
Describes the location of cases, not prices or economic metrics.
